titles.title: Freight for Farms Act
Freight for Farms Act

To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to support the expansion of freight rail infrastructure to support the transport of agricultural inputs and products to farms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development
